Title: Culture, communication and recreation activities
Notes: ICNPO Group 1

Title: Performing and visual arts
Notes: Includes theatres, galleries, music halls, dance studios, agencies promoting arts, etc.

Title: Museums, zoos, parks, historical sites and similar institutions
Notes: Excludes libraries, classified as A30, and natural reserves, classified as E10

Title: Culture and arts not elsewhere classfied
Sports activities
Notes: Includes amateur sports associations, agencies promoting sports, etc.

Title: Amusement and recreation services
Notes: Includes recreational facilities, but excludes member-serving organizations and social clubs (G13)

Title: Sports and recreation not elsewhere classfied
Information and communication services
Notes: Includes broadcasting, publishing, libraries, media centres, etc.

Title: Culture and arts services not elsewhere classfied
Education services
Notes: ICNPO Group 2 (except research, now classified as K10))

Title: Primary education
Notes: Includes institutions providing basic academic courses for very young children (kindergartens and elementary schools)

Title: Secondary education
Notes: Includes institutions providing academic courses typically for adolescents who have completed primary education

Title: Primary and secondary education not elsewhere classfied
Higher education
Notes: Includes institutions providing advanced academic courses for students who have completed secondary education

Title: Colleges and universities
Notes: Includes institutions offering four or more years of academic courses leading to an academic degree

Title: Higher education not elsewhere classfied
Notes: Includes community colleges and similar institutions not qualifying as B21

Title: Education support services
Notes: Includes testing and academic guidance services, student exchange, etc.

Title: Human health services
Notes: ICNPO Group 3

Title: General ambulatory health-care services
Notes: Includes institutions providing general health-care services

Title: Specialized outpatient care centres
Notes: Includes family planning, mental health or substance abuse treatment, rehabilitation, etc.

Title: Emergency medical response
Notes: Includes ambulance services, Red Cross, Doctors Without Borders, etc.

Title: Medical and diagnostic laboratories
Notes: Includes testing labs, kidney dialysis centres, etc.

Title: Ambulatory health-care services not elsewhere classfied
Specialty, psychiatric and substance abuse hospitals
Residential nursing care facilities
Notes: Includes convalescent homes, hospices, residential care and similar institutions providing continuous nursing care

Title: Residential care for the elderly
Notes: Includes retirement and assisted living homes for the elderly and similar facilities

Title: Nursing and residential care services not elsewhere classfied
Social services
Notes: ICNPO Group 4 (includes employment and training, formerly in ICNPO Group 6)

Title: Child and youth services
Notes: Excludes child day-care services (D20)

Title: Other individual and family services
Notes: Includes self-help groups like Alcoholics Anonymous, ex-offender rehabilitation, crisis intervention, helplines, etc.

Title: Child day-care services
Notes: Excludes kindergartens and similar institutions for very young children classified as pre-primary education (B11)

Title: Emergency and relief services
Notes: Includes institutions providing assistance in natural disasters, life events (such as burial societies), etc.

Title: Emergency and relief services not elsewhere classfied
Vocational rehabilitation services for people with barriers to employment
Job counselling or training activities
Notes: Excludes vocational and trade schools (B31)

Title: Sheltered workshops
Notes: Separate from activities in other groups (such as L20 and L30)

Title: Vocational rehabilitation services not elsewhere classfied
Environmental protection and animal welfare activities
Notes: ICNPO Group 5 (excludes organizations engaged in environmental and animal welfare advocacy, which should be classified in G12)

Title: Land or water management activities
Notes: Includes natural preserves, green spaces, wildlife sanctuaries, etc.

Title: Natural resource management, conservation and protection not else-where classfied
Animal health and welfare activities not elsewhere classfied
Environmental protection and animal welfare activities not elsewhere classfied
Community and economic development, and housing activities
Notes: ICNPO Group 6 (except vocational rehabilitation services, now D40)

Title: Construction of infrastructure
Notes: Roads, water and sewage and alternative energy infrastructure (solar, geothermal, etc.)

Title: Construction of housing and infrastructure not elsewhere classfied
Community and economic development activities
Notes: Includes financing or management of community and economic development projects

Title: Housing management and maintenance
Notes: Homeowner, tenant, community and neighbourhood associations, management of public or coop-erative housing, etc.

Title: Utilities and waste management
Notes: Includes providers of water, sewage and energy (gas, electricity or alternative energy sources)

Title: Indigenous people self-governance
Notes: Organizations established to manage and preserve indigenous culture, language, heritage, land and physical assets

Title: Community and economic development and housing not elsewhere classfied
Civic, advocacy, political and international activities
Notes: ICNPO Group 7 (plus international activities, formerly classified as ICNPO Group 9)

Title: Civic, advocacy and social participation activities
Notes: Excludes political activities (G20)

Title: Social advocacy
Notes: Includes advocacy for human and civil rights, public safety, literacy, science and similar public serv-ing activities

Title: Environment conservation and animal welfare advocacy
Social clubs and similar member-serving activities
Notes: Includes social/hobby/automobile/country clubs, consumer associations, fraternities and sororities, and similar member-serving activities; excludes housing management and maintenance (F30)

Title: Social youth organizations
Notes: Boy Scouts and Girl Scouts, etc.

Title: Civic, advocacy and social participation activities not elsewhere classfied
Political action, lobbying and similar activities
International activities
Notes: Formerly Group 9, includes institutions primarily engaged in promoting international exchange, aid and collaboration; excludes direct providers of services, such as education, health, social assistance, environmental protection or community development, which should be classified in sections B–F accordingly

Title: Civic, advocacy, political and international activities not elsewhere classfied
Philanthropic intermediaries and voluntarism promotion
Notes: ICNPO Group 8

Title: Other philanthropic intermediaries and voluntarism promotion
Notes: Includes operating foundations, fund-raising organizations and volunteer recruitment organizations

Title: Religious congregations and associations
Notes: ICNPO Group 10

Title: Other religious associations
Notes: Includes institutions primarily engaged in promoting religious faith; excludes faith-based direct providers of services, such as education, health or social assistance, which should be classified in sections B–D accordingly

Title: Business, professional and labour organizations
Notes: ICNPO Group 11

Title: Business, professional and labour organizations not elsewhere classfied
Professional, scientific, accounting and administrative services
Notes: Newly added

Title: Scientific research and testing services
Notes: Includes research in natural and social sciences and humanities, formerly subgroup 2400

Title: Professional services
Notes: Includes legal, mediation, accounting, architectural, engineering and similar services; excludes education support services (B32) and individual and family services (D10)

Title: Management and administrative services
Notes: Units engaged in administering, overseeing and managing other establishments, except housing management and maintenance (F30) and natural resource management and protection (E10)

Title: Professional, scientific and administrative services not elsewhere classfied
Other activities
Notes: ICNPO Group 12 with added detail and household activities

Title: Agriculture, forestry and fishing
Notes: Excluding eco-farming and forestry (E14)

Title: Trade activities
Notes: Includes retail and wholesale trade

Title: Unpaid activities of households
Notes: Direct volunteer work
